less: Press Enter to view more, or any other key to exit!({{$lines}} lines remaining)
persist_err:
This is an error in the app manifest.
The function (persist) must specify the parameter -dir or -file.
The function (persist) has been terminated, and the built-in option(persist) in Scoop is not affected (if it's configured)
no_shortcut:
The current Scoop config 'abgo_bucket_no_shortcut' has a value of true.
Desktop shortcuts are not created.
If you need the desktop shortcut, run the following command:
scoop config abgo_bucket_no_shortcut false

download.exist: The latest version({{$installed_version}}) of {{$app}} is already installed.
download.install_aria2_failed: It's failed to install aria2. Please try again
check_cache: Checking for the latest version of the installation package cache...
Cache not found, continue with manual download:
download.download:
Please download manually.
Please enter the downloaded file path:

clean_redundant_files: Run a background job: Delete redundant files generated during the installation process.
remove_app_lnk:
The current Scoop config 'abgo_bucket_no_shortcut' has a value of true.
It will run a background task to monitor if the installer create a desktop shortcut, and if it does, will delete it immediately.
If you need the desktop shortcut, run the following command:
scoop config abgo_bucket_no_shortcut false
no_remove_app_lnk:
If you don't need the desktop shortcut, run the following command:
scoop config abgo_bucket_no_shortcut true
uninstalling: Running the built-in uninstaller of this app...
